text: Zara inhein Aad ke bhai (Hud) ka qissa sunao jabke usne ahqaf mein apni qaum ko khabardar kiya tha aur aise khabardar karne waley ussey pehle bhi guzar chuke thay aur uske baad bhi aate rahey ke â€œ Allah ke siwa kisi ki bandagi na karo , mujhe tumhare haqq mein ek baday haulnaak din ke azaab ka andesha haiâ€
